General.Name: Shenzhen Ellassay Fashion Co
General.Description: Shenzhen Ellassay Fashion Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells branded women fashion products in China and internationally. The company offers its products under the ELLASSAY, Laurel, IRO Paris, Ed Hardy, and self-portrait brand names through its retail outlets. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China. Shenzhen Ellassay Fashion Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shenzhen Ellassay Investment Management Ltd.
